testcase.name: Test Case 18
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then Verify that categories are visible on left side bar....................passed Then User click on 'Women' category.........................................passed Then User clicks on any category link under 'Women' category, for example: Dress.passed Then Verify that category page is displayed and confirm text WOMEN - TOPS PRODUCTS.passed Then clicks on any sub-category link of 'Men' category On left side bar.....passed Then Verify that user is navigated to that category page....................passed
